Name: Nate Solon
Text: Hi Ana, just wanted to say thank you for your webinar. I used your system to name my highest performing post, which is currently responsible for quite a lot of my overall profit. Of course now I’ll use the same system to more posts. I want to send a screenshot of the stats but looks like I can’t in messages anyway it’s this post. It’s converted $3500 in paid subs.

Text: What a brilliant, actionable, organised, inspiring bootcamp. Thank you, Ana.

Text: I was skeptical at first, but this program completely changed my perspective. The step-by-step guidance helped me launch my newsletter and start making money within weeks.
